name: Mega Man Zero 3
description: Mega Man Zero 3 continues the saga of the main character, Zero, and introduces new gameplay elements that build and expand upon previous games in the Zero series. While Zero and his Reploid (robot) allies continue the fight for peace in Neo Arcadia, a new reploid, Omega, attempts to brainwash the Resistance. Now, as Zero, you must save your allies by using new customizable chips, a new Recoil Rod weapon, Cyber Elves that increase your abilities, and secret disks that offer valuable information.
